name: hat

A1 a covering for the head that is not part of a piece of clothing: a straw hat a woolly hat a wide-brimmed hat
Susanna Price/Dorling Kindersley/GettyImages
used to refer to one of the various jobs or responsibilities that someone has: wear a hat For this movie, she is wearing the hats of director and actress. This is me with my manager's hat on talking.
More examplesFewer examplesHang your coat and hat on the rack over there.Do I look ridiculous in this hat?It was silly of you to go out in the hot sun without a hat.A crowd of football fans wearing scarves and hats flooded into the bar.Upon her head she wore a black velvet hat.
